intension: Create a Facebook advertisement for a winter travel tour to Alt Lenzig, showcasing the beauty of the winter town. Offer a 10% discount for those who book by October 25th.
globalcaption: The image features a snow-covered house with a large roof, surrounded by a beautiful snowy landscape. The house is situated on a hill, and the snow-covered trees in the background create a serene winter scene. The house appears to be a prominent structure in the image, with its roof and walls clearly visible.
keywords: winter, travel, snow, vacation, house, building, architecture, frame, snowy, facebook, ad, fb, advertisement

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a snow-covered cabin with a steep roof, surrounded by a snowy landscape. The cabin is situated on a hill, and the snow has accumulated on the roof, giving it a frozen appearance. The scene also includes a snow-covered tree nearby, adding to the wintry atmosphere
